_instructions: To add this concert to Firestore: 1) Go to Firebase Console > Firestore Database, 2) Create a 'concerts' collection if it doesn't exist, 3) Click 'Add document', 4) Use 'Auto-ID' or enter a custom ID like 'test-concert', 5) Add each field below as the correct type
